LanguageData.Bullet_Velvet_Camera.label: Velvet_Camera bullet
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera.label: Velvet's Camera
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera.description: Velvet's Weapon, belonging to Velvet Scarlatina, consists of a camera and a box. The weapon is capable of creating solid "light copies" of any weapon Velvet has photographed, which she can then use in battle.
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera.tools.0.label: side
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera.tools.1.label: front
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera_Box.label: Velvet's Camera Box
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera_Box.description: Velvet's Weapon, belonging to Velvet Scarlatina, consists of a camera and a box. The weapon is capable of creating solid "light copies" of any weapon Velvet has photographed, which she can then use in battle.
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera_Box.tools.0.label: side
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera_Box.tools.1.label: front
